findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to perform various actions such as pausing/unpausing the contract, enabling/disabling antisnipe, changing maximum transaction amount, marking addresses as bots, withdrawing tokens, and more.

findings.title: Vesting Amount Exceeded
findings.description: The vesting amount exceeded in Vesting contract.

findings.title: Vesting Period not completed
findings.description: In Vesting._saleOperations, monthlyAmount and claimableAmount are affected by a multiplication on the result of a division.
